original_text: I brought the boy to your disciples, but they could not make him well.’
korean_text: 내가 주의 제자들에게 데리고 왔으나 능히 고치지 못하더이다

sentences.original_text: I brought the boy to your disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 소년을 당신의 제자들에게 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: but they could not make him well
